metadata.description: ResponsiBid team plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: biome-autoformat
plugins.description: Automatically runs Biome check --write after file modifications to enforce project lint and formatting standards

plugins.name: commit-commands
plugins.description: Streamline your git workflow with commands for committing, pushing, and creating pull requests without co-author attribution

plugins.name: db-query
plugins.description: Read-only local database query tool for MySQL and PostgreSQL. Allows querying, schema inspection, and table listing without any write operations.

plugins.name: reviewer
plugins.description: Light code review of current branch changes focused on anti-pattern detection

plugins.name: spec-kit
plugins.description: Auto-installs and integrates GitHub spec-kit for spec-driven development workflows

plugins.name: unit-tests
plugins.description: Update and create unit tests based on current branch changes
